scripts.release: pnpm --filter ./sites/example-project package && pnpm --filter ./packages/evidence build && pnpm changeset publish
scripts.release:next: VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && pnpm -r exec npm pkg set version=0.0.0-"$VERSION" && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -r publish --tag next --no-git-checks
scripts.test: pnpm --filter ./sites/example-project package && pnpm --filter ./packages/evidence build && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -r test
scripts.postinstall: pnpm --filter ./sites/example-project package && pnpm --filter ./packages/evidence build && pnpm install --ignore-scripts
